name: BRAIN
short_description: BRAIN is a software platform for ultrasonic array data acquisition and processing, written by the Ultrasonics and Non-Destructive Testing (NDT) group at the University of Bristol, UK. BRAIN is particularly designed around Full Matrix Capture (FMC) for NDT applications. BRAIN is written in Matlab and can be downloaded either as Matlab functions that can be executed from within the Matlab environment or as a standalone version. The latter does not require Matlab to be installed, but does require the appropriate version of the free Matlab runtime library to be downloaded and installed from the Mathworks website.
summary: BRAIN - Ultrasonic Array Data Acquisition and Processing Platform
